feature.name: Evolved Load-Based Distribution at Release
feature.summary: The Evolved Load-Based Distribution at Release feature allows for a more cognizant UE

parameters.name: LoadBalancingFunction.coverageAwareLbdar
parameters.description: When this parameter is set to true, the Evolved                                 Load-Based Distribution at Release with hit rate functionality is                                 enabled.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.lbdarCoverageThreshold  EUtranCellTDD.lbdarCoverageThreshold
parameters.description: This parameter is used as a threshold to consider if a frequency                                 relation qualifies for Load-Based Distribution at Release                                 prioritization. If the aggregated hit rate is less than or equal to                                 a configurable threshold                                     (lbdarCoverageThreshold) then that                                 frequency relation is considered as a low coverage probability                                 frequency.

parameters.name: EUtranFreqRelation.lbActivationThreshold
parameters.description: The threshold range is extended from (0..1000) to (0..16000). The new                                 range reflects the range of                                     IdleModePrioAtRelease.highLoadThreshold and                                 allows better control of interaction between Inter-Frequency Load                                 Balancing and Evolved Load-Based Distribution at Release.

parameters.name: IdleModePrioAtRelease.highLoadThreshold
parameters.description: Evolved Load-Based Distribution at Release uses this threshold to                                 determine whether a cell is highly loaded or not by comparing it to                                 the cell subscription ratio.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012397 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012397 MO instance.
